column2: Between several engine configurations, four fall within top 3 tax level brackets. BlueHDi 100 variant is the only one in the second tax bracket.
column3: BlueHDi is a newer engine than e-HDi. Of the three BlueHDi, the entry price for the 100 variant is the lowest.
column4: Based on a linear fit, the BlueHDi 120 holds its value better.
